_signin.logo.comment: This is the alt text for the main sign in logo image
_signin.header.comment: The main welcome text for sign in page
signin.subheader: Sign in to Microsoft Teams using your school account to get started.
_signin.subheader.comment: Sign in meassage telling user to use their account to sign in
_signin.button.comment: VERB - signs user into the app
_signin.button.ariaLabel.comment: Accessibility comment that tells user to sign in
_createLandingPage.create.stream.comment: ACTION - Button that creates a new stream
_createLandingPage.create.stream.ariaLab: Accessibility label that tells user to click and create stream
createLandingPage.schedule.header: Schedule Teams streams for your course.
_createLandingPage.schedule.header.comme: Text that informs user you cn schedule a stream
_streamPage.header.comment: Header of stream page telling user it's the new Stream creation page
_streamPage.create.comment: VERB - Button to create a new stream
_streamPage.cancel.comment: VERB - Button to cancel creating a stream
_streamPage.title.input.comment: Placeholder text for an input for adding a title of the new stream
_copyStreamPage.failed.copy.comment: Error message that happens when a stream fails to copy to the clipboard
_copyStreamPage.header.comment: Heading that tells user that the stream was created successfully
_copyStreamPage.teams.link.comment: Link text that has the Teams stream URL
_copyStreamPage.conference.id.comment: Label that tells the user what the conference ID is
